attributes.action: :   Promote and enhance democracy by entering into wide-ranging and open-minded discussion and consultation with the public, regarding future government policy, in relation to an issue it has been petitioned on, where the signatories to that petition amount to 250,000 or more, and to publish material relating to that consultation in direct response to the original petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The support for any petition is a very good reflection of wider support in the country for the cause/issue being put forward in any petition.  For any one person signing a petition it is the case that there are many more who agree, but have not signed any particular petition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
